game.title: Save the Princess
game.objective: Rescue the princess from the villain's fortress
game.description: The princess has been kidnapped by the evil villain and taken to his heavily guarded fortress. Your mission is to infiltrate the fortress, defeat any guards in your way, and rescue the princess
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and the gratitude of the king

task.description: You must find a way to sneak into the fortress, avoiding the guards and any traps that might be set up
Once inside the fortress, you will encounter guards that you must defeat in order to progress further
Navigate through the fortress to locate the princess who will be held captive in a secret chamber
Successfully escape the fortress with the rescued princess, making sure to avoid any pursuing guards or traps
